articles.title: 10 healthy habits that make intelligent people the way they are - The Times of India
articles.description: ​Have you ever wondered what makes intelligent people the way they are? It's not just the mental strength they have, it is also about the healthy habits they have. Here are a few things you must know about these exceptional individuals.
articles.content: Engaging in lifelong learning through reading, attending seminars, or learning new skills fosters mental agility, creativity, and adaptability.
